texts.en: Dilafruz is 37 years old. She is a very hard-working and kind woman. She is married and has 3 children. She always strives to innovate and tries to improve her standard of living. She recently completed a course entitled "Get Ahead" organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. She is now fully able to establish her own business and to become successful at it. She wants to start a business selling groceries. She plans to use the income she earns to provide her children with a good education and nutritional food. Dilafruz is seeking a loan of 14,500 Tajikistan Somoni to buy a refrigerator for her grocery store, as she will sell dairy products. She is waiting for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy fridge to set up a new business

loans.name: Mahmadullo

texts.ru: Махмадулло 42 года. У него жена и четверо детей. Махмадулло работает продавцом на рынке своего города. Он продает фрукты (яблоко, мандарин, гранат, бананы и т.д.). Он занимается продажей уже 4 года. Махмадулло хочет увеличить товарооборот и получить хорошую прибыль. Он берет кредит на сумму 5000 TJS для приобретения ассортимента товаров.
texts.en: Mahmadullo is 42 years old, married, and has 4 children. He works as a salesperson at the market of his hometown. He sells fruit (apples, mandarin oranges, pomegranates, bananas, and so on.) He has been doing this type of work for the last 4 years. He now wants to increase his turnover so he can earn a good profit. Mahmadullo is seeking a loan of 5,000 Tajikistan Somoni to purchase an assortment of fruit.

loans.use: To purchase an assortment of fruit

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 51 years old, a widow with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Emma has been in this business for four years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Emma aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Flora Bernadette

texts.en:
Flora Bernadette lives at Tuguegarao. She is 33 years old, married, and has two children. She manages a beauty salon for income. Her spouse also helps her manage the business. They offer hair colorings, dyes and facial treatments. Flora had been in the business for over three years now. From the business, she is able to gain approximately P20,000 each month. She uses it for meals, school fees for her children and as revolving capital in the business in order to keep offering good services. 

She aims to keep extending friendly services and increase her income. That is why she is asking for a loan of P30,000 to buy medicines for hair treatments, curlers, colors and dyes to use in her salon. It will help satisfy customers with the good services they offer.

In the future, Flora Bernadette hopes to keep improving her business and become successful and financially stable.

loans.use: to buy medicines for hair treatments, curlers, colors and dyes to use in her salon.

loans.name: Analy

texts.en:
As a married parent of 5 children, Analy works hard to support her family. She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and a computer games business. She is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy vegetables, meat, chicken and more ingredients for her restaurant business.

Analy has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF, and more recently through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, chicken and more ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizers and maize seedlings.

loans.name: Cherelyn

texts.en:
Cherelyn is 34 years old and married with four children; three of her children are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Cherelyn has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines. Cherelyn requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy an additional tricycle.

Cherelyn has been in this business for six years.  In the future, Cherelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy an additional tricycle.

loans.name: Igor

texts.ru:
Игорь занимается огородничеством в селе Гладковка. На 22 сотках он выращивает в теплицах огурцы, ранний картофель. Тепличным хозяйством Игорь занимается уже 4 года.
Игорь обратился к КИВА за суммой в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы приготовить теплицы к наступающему сезону. Полученную дополнительную прибыль Игорь собирается потратить на дальнейшее содержание и расширение своего тепличного бизнеса, а также нужды семьи.
texts.en: Igor is a produce farmer in the village of Gladovka. On 2,200 square meters [about one-fifth of a hectare] of land, he grows cucumbers in greenhouses as well as early potato varieties. Igor has been in greenhouse farming for four years. He applied to Kiva for a loan in the amount of 10,000 UAH in order to prepare his greenhouses for the upcoming agricultural season. Igor plans to use the resulting additional income to maintain and expand his farming business and also to provide for family needs.

loans.use: to prepare his greenhouses for the new agricultural season.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon works hard to support her family. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 1,800 through NWTF to buy a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of emergency.

Corazon is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is saving money, helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en: Remedios is a 46-year-old married woman and mother of five children from Bohol, Philippines. She is engaged in fishing business together with her husband for more than 14 years now. They are also into rice farming ventures. Remedios is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, and fuel for the boat. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, and fuel for the boat

loans.name: Baraka Group

texts.en:
Baraka is a group of 10 farmers in Bungoma South District represented by Emily. The group has 9 women and 1 man. Emily is on the right of the photo with her hand raised. Farming inputs will be delivered to her on credit consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ an acre of maize, millet and sorghum. Emily is a new One Acre Fund farmer and is excited for the 2013 Long Rains season. She joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer and get inputs delivered to her on time. 

Emily described her harvest last year as good, but hopes she can have an even better one as a One Acre Fund farmer. She hopes that her profits from the 2013 Long Rains season can be used to send her children to school and rent a farm to do more farming. Emily’s group members will each receive input loans of ½ acre during the 2013 Long Rains season. In total they will receive inputs for 5 acres of maize and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Muyayi South A Group

texts.en:
Muyayi South A Group is located in Bungoma District. It is a group of 15 women and 6 men led by Geoffrey pictured on the right with his hand raised. He is receiving an input loan for ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. The 2013 Long Rains season will be Geoffrey’s first season with One Acre Fund. He joined this year in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer, grow enough food for his family, and fight hunger in the commmunity.

Last year, Geoffrey harvested 8 bags of maize on 1 acre of land. He is excited to improve his harvest as a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. He plans to use the money that he earns from his next harvest to send his children to school and invest in cows. For the 2013 Long Rains season, Geoffrey’s group members will take input loans of ½ acre each. In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 10.5 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru: Рустамчон мужчина в возрасте 38 лет, женат, имеет четверых детей.  Рустамчон всю свою жизнь занимается животноводством так как не имеет образования и в свое время не учился.   Жена домохозяйка,занимается воспитанием детей но в свободное время помогает мужу по откорму скота.  Они живут в горном районе и откорм скота является приемлемым и дает очень хороший доход. Так как это их единственный доход они стараются развивать этот бизнес.  Чтобы прокормить семью и улучшить жизнедеятельность, он планирует увеличить поголовье скота и на полученный кредит купить скот.  У него есть большая мечта, он хочет чтобы его дети учились в хороших учебных заведениях и поэтому стремится достичь своей цели.   Рустамчон очень рад,что существуют такие организации как Кива, что с помощью таких организаций люди которые нуждаются в финансовой поддержке могут осуществить свои планы. Рустамчон заранее благодарит организацию Кива.
texts.en: Rustamjon is 38 years old, married, and has 4 children. He has worked in animal husbandry all his life because he did not study in his younger years and does not have an education. His wife is a homemaker who raises the children, but in her free time, she helps her husband feed the cattle. They live in a mountainous region where raising cattle is a good way of making a living and brings in a nice income. As this is their only source of earnings, they are trying to develop their business. In order to feed his family and improve his livelihood, Rustamjon plans to increase his herd and will use this loan to purchase cattle. He has a big dream: he wants his children to study in good educational institutions, which is why he is striving to reach his goal. He is very happy that such organisations as Kiva exist, and that with their assistance, people who need financial support can realise their plans. Rustamjon thanks Kiva in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Edwina

texts.en: Edwina is 29 years old and married with 2 children. She lives Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting corn for sale and earns 4,000 PHP as a living. She joined GDMPC in 2012. Edwina requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Roditha

texts.en: Roditha is a 27 years old and married with 2 children. She lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting rice for sale to earn a living. She's been with her business over 3 years and earns 4,000 PHP. She joined GDMPC in 2012. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Qurbonali

texts.ru: Курбонали житель города Дангара. Ему 49 лет. Он женат и отец четверых детей. Его старший сын уехал на заработки в заграницу, а второй сын служит в армии. У Курбонали среднее специальное образование. Он работал педагогом в средней школе в течение семи лет. С 2008 года он занимается животноводством. Он покупает крупно-рогатый скот, откармливает его, затем продает с наценкой. Курбонали берет кредит для закупа скота. За счет его прибыли он планирует расширить свою деятельность.
texts.en: Qurbonali lives in the town of Dangara. He is 49 years old, married, and has 4 children. His eldest son is a migrant worker in a foreign country, and his second oldest son is serving in the army. Qurbonali has a specialised secondary education. For 7 years, he worked as a teacher in a high school, and since 2008, he has been raising cattle. He buys cattle, fattens them, and then sells them for a profit. He is now seeking a loan to purchase cattle. He plans to use the income generated by this loan to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, de 48, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Gerardo su esposo. Ambos tienen 6 hijos a los que cuidan con mucho amor y cariño, en la casa que heredaron hace 10 años. 
Ella es una mujer muy ágil, sobre todo porque siempre, camina varios kilómetros para poder ordeñar sus vacas, quienes se encuentran en un establo a las afueras de su localidad. Todo el día ella se dedica sus cuidados, pues siempre le brindan un promedio de 10 litros de leche con lo que realiza, moldes de queso que la ayuda a conseguir ingreso económico diario. Además aprovecha ese tiempo para poder cuidar de sus sembríos de papa, maíz y demás hortalizas, las cuales cosecha con mucha satisfacción y las comercializa en el mismo lugar. “los mismo comerciantes llegan con sus camiones”, afirma. Se siente tranquila y tiene muchos planes de mejorar su calidad de vida, pues su esposo trabaja en una empresa de construcción de carreteras, donde está obteniendo buenos ingresos.
Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “La rosa de paltarumi” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada.
Julia, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de comida balanceada para sus animales y si el dinero le alcanza fertilizantes naturales para distribuir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Julia, age 48, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with her husband, Gerardo.  They have six children, whom they are raising with great love and affection in the house they inherited ten years ago.

She is a very agile woman.  This is mostly because she always walks several kilometers in order to be able to milk their cows.  The cows are in a stable on the outskirts of her area.  She spends her whole day taking care of them.  They always give her an average of ten liters of milk, which she uses to make cheese molds.  This helps her to get daily income.

She also takes advantage of this time to take care of her potato, corn, and vegetable crops.  She harvests them with great satisfaction, and she sells them in the same place.  “The same merchants come in their trucks,” she says.

She feels at peace, and she has a lot of plans to improve her quality of life.  Her husband works for a road construction company, and he gets good income.

She belongs to the La Rosa de Paltarumi communal bank, and this is her eighth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to be able to do her normal business activities because she has support from all of you.  She pledges to make all of her payments punctually.  She has always been a hard-working and honest person.

Julia will use the requested loan to buy balanced feed for her animals.  If there is enough money, she will buy natural fertilizers for her crops.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals, and if there is enough money, she will buy natural fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Hasanboy

texts.ru:
Хасанбой с юности занимается откормом и разведением скота.   Он женат и имеет четверых детей.  Хасанбой занимается откормом скота у себя дома.  Недавно он женил своего сына, сыграли очень веселую свадьбу. Были очень крупные расходы,он продал два скота,чтобы провести свадьбу.  Теперь Хасанбой хочет построить дом для молодоженов так как всем вместе жить им очень тесно.  Откорм скота это их единственный доход  поэтому Хасанбой планирует развивать этот бизнес и на прибыль построить дом для сына.  
 На полученный кредит Хасанбой хочет купить скот и увеличить стадо. Таким образом он расширит свой бизнес и откормив до весны,продаст за хорошую прибыль.  Он заранее благодарит организацию Кива за финансовую поддержку и понимание.
texts.en: Hasanboy has been raising cattle since his youth. He is married and has 4 children. He raises cattle at home. Recently, he hosted a very jubilant wedding for his son. He incurred substantial expenses, and sold 2 cows to pay for the wedding. Now he wants to build a house for the newlyweds, as it is too crowded for the whole family to live together. Raising cattle is their only source of income, which is why Hasanboy plans to develop his business and use the profit to build a house for his son. He will use the loan to buy cattle to increase his herd, thereby expanding his business and enabling him to sell the fattened cattle in the spring for a good profit. He thanks Kiva in advance for the financial support and understanding.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 44 años es una madre responsable. Tiene 2 hijas, pero solo vive con Yanina, la última hija. Cuidó de sus hijas, sola, “fue difícil”, comenta pero con la ayuda de su familia pudo salir adelante. Su principal actividad económica es el bordado de fustanes Wanka, que son trajes típicos. Consiste en el bordado a hilo, los cuales vende a 200 nuevos soles, y a la semana realiza un promedio de 2 que comercializa en un mercado reconocido de la ciudad. Pero como buena mujer del campo, por temporadas siembra papa y olluco en sus propios terrenos agrícolas, cuenta que en cada cosecha comercializa sus alimentos en la feria de uno de los distritos de la ciudad, donde obtiene buenas ganancias, aprovecha esa oportunidad, para vender los animales que cría entre toros y cerdos. Ahora se encuentra tranquila y con la convicción de sacar profesional a su última hija. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “barrio oriental” y este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, pues lleva muchos años de conocerlos.
María; invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para su próxima siembra y si el dinero le alcanza comprará comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old and is a responsible mother.  She has 2 daughters, but she only lives with Yanina, her oldest daughter.  She raised her daughters by herself.  "It was difficult," she says, but with the help of her family she was able to get by.  

Her main source of income is embroidering traditional "Wanka" underskirts.  She embroiders with thread and sells her products for 200 sols.  She makes an average of 2 products a week, which she sells in a well-known market in the city.  However, like every good country woman, she also sows potatoes and olluco (a native tuber) on her own farmland.  

She says that when she harvests her crops, she sells them in the market in one of the districts of the city, where she makes good profits.  She makes the most of this opportunity to sell the animals that she raises (bulls and pigs).  Currently, María is calm in the knowledge that she will help her youngest daughter become a professional.  

María is a member of "Barrio Oriental" (Eastern Neighborhood) communal bank and this is her 17th loan from MFP.  She is thankful for their support, which will allow her to achieve her goals.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  In addition, she enjoys being a part of their organization and has been involved with them for many years.

María will invest the money she has requested in buying organic fertilizer to use for the next harvest and also balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: buy organic fertilizer for her next harvest and (if sufficient funds remain) healthy feed for her animals

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona, a 40-year-old married mother of five, lives in Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She has been growing and harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living for five years, earning 3,000 PHP a month.

A member of GDMPC since 2010, Chona has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru:
Сайёра  женщина в возрасте 35 лет. Замужем, имеет 3 детей.   Она вместе с мужем    более  12 лет занимаются  откормом скота.   В наличии имеет около 18 голов мелко рогатого скота.    Сайёра содержит скот у себя дома и она  очень хорошо разбирается в преимуществах своего дела, знает когда закупать и продавать скот. У нее также имеется дойная корова.    Каждый день  Сайера доит по 10 литров молока и  продаёт молоко соседям и знакомым.  Старший сын находится в Российской Федерации. Он зарабатывает там денежные средства и каждый месяц по возможности отправляет деньги родителям, а младшие дети   пока  учатся в школе.   
 Сайёра  на полученный кредит   хочет купить скот и увеличить свое стадо.   Заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Sayora is 35 years old, married, and has 3 children. She and her husband have been raising livestock for over 12 years. They now have 18 head of livestock which Sayora raises at home. She has a very good understanding of the nature of this business, and she knows when to buy and sell animals. She also has a dairy cow. Every day, she milks up to 10 litres of milk and sells it to her neighbours and acquaintances. Her eldest son is in the Russian Federation where he earns money, and he sends some cash to his parents every month whenever possible. Her younger children are still studying in school. Sayora plans to use this loan to increase her herd. She thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia, de 49 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Moisés, su esposo desde hace 16 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos de los cuales solo vive con 3 de ellos en su casa propia. 
Ella se siente dichosa de tener el apoyo de su esposo, quien le ayuda cada vez que pueda. Pues la actividad de ambos es la agricultura, mientras su esposo trabaja como peón, ella se dedica a l cuidado de sus 8 vacas y 3 toros de las cuales extrae la leche que producen para venderlos a los pobladores de su localidad. Su secreto es sembrar por ella misma alfalfa y de esa manera alimenta a su animales, pero siempre les ofrece comida balanceada y vitaminas para mantenerlos fuertes y que produzcan buena leche. Paralelo a este trabajo siembra maíz, papa; en terrenos alquilados, ya cuando es tiempo de la cosecha los comercializa a los compradores mayoristas que buscan el maíz que solo ella sabe producir. Quiere comprar sus propios terrenos y así depender de ella misma. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “barrio oriental” y este es el crédito número 18 con MFP, por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, pues lleva muchos años de conocerlos.
Antonia; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para esparcir en sus cultivos y si el dinero le alcanza comprará también comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Antonia is 49 years old. She is a hardworking woman who lives with her husband of 16 years, Moisés. They have 6 children together, 3 of whom still live with them in their own home.

She feels blessed that her husband supports her and that he helps her whenever he is able. They both work in agriculture. While her husband works as a laborer, she cares for their 8 cows and 3 bulls. She also milks the cows and sells the milk to the residents of their village. In addition to the balanced feed and vitamins that she feeds her animals to keep them healthy and to aid in good milk production, she secretly plants alfalfa to feed them. She also plants corn and potatoes on land that she rents. When it is time to harvest her crops, she sells them to wholesale buyers who request her corn in particular. She wants to buy her own piece of land so she can be independent. She belongs to a supportive group called “Barrio Oriental” and this is their 18th loan with MFP. She is grateful for all the support she has received to help her reach her goals. She is committed to making her payments. She is also happy to be a part of this group and has known them for many years.

Antonia will use her loan to buy organic fertilizer to spread on her crops as well as balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: purchase organic fertilizer for her crops and balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, de 23 años es una responsable madre soltera. Vive en compañía de su hijo Marck y su mamá felicita, en la casa donde nació. Desde niña le enseñaron a sembrar y dedicarse a la tierra, en terrenos que le fueron heredados por parte de su madre, siembra maíz, su principal y único cultivo, pues como ella dice, ahí obtiene mayores ganancias, ya que es el alimento que más se consume en la región y siempre mantiene el precio de venta en el mercado. Los meses donde obtiene más ganancias, es en setiembre y octubre, por ello se encuentra en planes de sembrar programando la cosecha para esos meses. De la misma manera cuenta con 2 toros, que le sirven para arar la tierra, para comenzar la siembra, “de esa manera no pago a otras personas por hacerlo”, comenta. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Sarita colonia” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, agradece la oportunidad que le brindan, ya que podrá mejorar su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues le gusta trabajar en su asociación, donde todos son personas responsables y solidarias.
Maribel, invertirá el dinero en la compra de semilla y abono orgánico para distribuir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Maribel, age 23, is a responsible single mother.  She lives with her son, Marck, and her mother, Felicity.  She lives in the house where she was born. Ever since she was a girl, they taught her how to plant and work the land.  

She grows corn, her principle and only crop, on land inherited from her mother.  As she says, that way you get good income.  This is because it is the food that is consumed the most in the region, and it always maintains its price in the market.  She gets the most income in September and October.  Therefore, she is planning to plant and program the harvest for these months.

She also has two bulls that she uses to plow the land in order to start sowing.  “This way I do not pay other people to do it,” she says.

She belongs to the Sarita Colonia communal bank, and this is her third loan with MFP.  She is grateful for this opportunity because she will be able to improve her business.  She pledges to make her payments.  She likes working with her communal bank, where all of the people are responsible and supportive.

Maribel will use the loan to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for her crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is 48 years old, married, with four children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

She owns and operates farmland, planting, harvesting, and selling bananas to earn a living. She's been with her business over five years and earns PHP 2,000 each month. Luz joined Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) in 2010. 

Luz requested a loan PHP 6,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. In the future, she wants to improve her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Zioymidin

texts.ru: Зиёмидин, мужчина в возрасте 46 лет, проживает в сельской местности. Женат и имеет троих детей. Зиёмидин работает в колхозе , бригадиром. На протяжении 10 лет он занимается выращиванием пшеницы. По мимо пшеницы у него 5 Га земли с абрикосовым садом. Зиёмидин единственный кормилец в семье, супруга его нигде не работает, так как не имеет высшего образования. В свободное время от домашних дел  она помогает супругу по выращиванию пшеницы.  Зиёмидин, берет кредит для закупки минерального удобрения. Он благодарен ООО МДО Арванд за своевременную поддержку в тяжелую минуту.
texts.en:
Zioymidin is a 46-year-old man living in a rural area. He is married and has three children. Zioymidin works on the collective farm as a foreman. For ten years, he has been involved in the cultivation of wheat. Aside of the wheat, he has five hectares of land with an apricot orchard. 

Zioymidin is the only breadwinner for the family, and his wife is not working and does not have a higher education. In her spare time from household chores, she helps her husband to grow wheat. 

Zioymidin is taking a loan to but mineral fertilizer. He is thankful to Arvand MDO Ltd. for the timely support in a difficult moment.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
En la calidad ciudad de Chincha, caracterizada también por su alegría y su variada gastronomía, vive Mary una joven con un carisma contagiante y sobre todo con muchas ganas de salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades. Mary en sus pocos tiempos libres disfruta de escuchar música ya que actualmente estudia la carrera de contabilidad y para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios trabaja en un supermercado de su ciudad, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y acude a sus clases por las noches, a pesar de ser un poco cansado ella saca muchas fuerzas para seguir adelante ya que para ella el ser una profesional es su mayor objetivo y sobre todo porque quiere darle a sus padres la alegría de verla convertida en una profesional.

Mary está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales de estudio como libros, separatas, entre otros; de esta manera podrá tener los materiales necesarios para estudiar y poder luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y tener un buen empleo”.
texts.en:
In the warm city of Chincha, also characterized by its happiness and its varied cuisine, lives Mary, a young girl with infectious charisma, and above all, a great desire to get ahead in spite of adversities.  

In her little free time, Mary enjoys listening to music, since she is currently studying accounting.  In order to cover her educational expenses, she works in a supermarket in her city.  She works around 8 hours a day and attends her classes at night.  Even though it's a bit tiring, she puts forth great effort in order to get ahead.  For her, becoming a professional is her most important goal and above all, she wants to give her parents the joy of seeing her become a professional.

Mary is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because, thanks to their support, she will be able to buy study materials such as books and supplements, among other things.  In this way, she will be able to have the materials she needs to study and to be able to fight to realize her greatest dream:  "To finish her degree and to get a good job."

loans.use: to buy books, materials and supplements, among other things.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is 57 years old, widowed, with three children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

Flora owns and operates a business selling seafood products, including fish and shrimp, in the local community. She's been engaged with her business for over 18 years and she earns PHP 7,000 per month. She joined Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDPMC) in 2009. 

Flora requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional fish and shrimp products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish and shrimp products to sell.

loans.name: Liparit

texts.ru:
Липариту 60 лет. Он женат и живет вместе с сыном, невесткой и внуками. Жена Липарита находится за границей на командировке. 
Липарит более 20 лет  как занимается ремонтом электродвигателей. У него множество клиентов - не только физические лица а также юридические лица предпочитают обратится за ремонтом электродвигателей к Липариту . У Липарита тяжелая но прибыльная работа, которая позволяет ему достойно содержать семью. 
Содержать ин большую семью Липариту помогает сын который работает рабочим  в Медно-молибденовом комбинате Капана . 
На этот месяц у Липарита множество заказов и ему нужен кредит на сумму 700.000 Армянских драм,  для покупки электропроводов разного сечения. Кредит  поможет липариту во время выполнить все заказы ,что обеспечат ему хорошую прибыль .
texts.en:
Liparit is 60 years old. He is married and lives together with his son, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. Liparit's wife is aboard on a business assignment. 

For more than 20 years, Liparit has been repairing electrical motors. He has many customers -- not only individuals but also business entities prefer to seek Liparit to complete motor repairs. For Liparit, it is challenging but lucrative work that allows him to provide adequate support for his family. 
 
To support their large family, Liparit is helped by his son who is a worker in the Kapan copper-molybdenum factory. 

This month Liparit has many orders and he needed a loan of 700,000 Armenian dram (AMD) to purchase electrical cables of different cross-sections. The loan will help Liparit to fulfill all the orders, which will provide him a good profit.

loans.use: to purchase electrical cables of different cross-sections

loans.name: Tulkinjon

texts.ru:
Тулкинчон пришел в МДО «Арванд» чтобы получить кредит для увеличения поголовья скота. В данное время у него всего лишь три голов скота так как в прошлом году он построил дом и ему пришлось продать несколько голов скота,чтобы купить строительные материалы. Сейчас у него есть денежные средства но не достаточно чтобы купить скот. Тулкинчон планирует продолжать развивать свой бизнес и хочет увеличить поголовье скота.
 На полученный кредит Тулкинчон хочет скот и поэтому обратился в Арванд, он надеется что ему помогут и поддержат Финансово. Заранее благодарит.
texts.en:
Tulkinjon joined MDO Arvand in order to get a loan to increase his count of livestock. At this time, he has only three head of cattle since last year he built a home and had to sell a few head of cattle to buy building materials. Now, he has money but not enough to buy cattle. Tulkinjon plans to continue to grow his business and wants to increase the number of livestock. 

With the loan, Tulkinjon wants cattle and therefore appealed to Arvand. He hopes that they will help him and provide financial support.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Alfredo Adalberto

texts.es: Alfredo Adalberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la  compra y venta de repuestos para bicicleta, llantas, cadenas, frenos, entre otros  se ha hecho de mucha experiencia lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, ya tiene mucha clientela y las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Alfredo es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y todo un soñador, todos los días lucha por cumplir cada una de sus metas,  esta totalmente comprometido con su sueño y no descansara hasta tener éxito, necesita de materiales para el negocio es por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar llantas, frenos, cadenas, asientos, etc. Alfredo Adalberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alfredo Adalberto lives with his life partner and their children in his own home.  He has a business buying and selling spare parts for bicycles, including: tires, chains, brakes, and other parts.  He has a lot of experience in this line of work, and so he is able to obtain good earnings.  He already has a lot of customers, and they prefer his business because all of his products are good quality and affordable, and he offers unparalleled service that is always to his customers' liking.  Alfredo is an enterprising man who is devoted to his work.  He is also a dreamer, who strives each day to accomplish every one of his goals.  He is committed to accomplishing his dream, and will not rest until he achieves success.  

Alfredo needs some supplies for his business, so for this reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  He will use the funds to buy tires, brakes, chains, seats, etc.  Alfredo Adalberto has good credit references and is very responsible.  He is certain that he will be able to pay off the debt, and he also has faith that he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bicycle tires, brakes, chains and seats

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru: Абдурахмон , родился и проживает в сельской местности ,  он 1949 года рождения. Женат и имеет 3 детей. Абдурахмон, с юности занимается выращиванием абрикосового сада, а также работает в колхозе- бригадиром. В летний время года Абдурахмон собирает урожай, затем этот урожай сушит и продает на местном рынке. Это его основной семейный доход. Супруга его нигде не работает, она помогает ему в сборе, сушки и продаже урожая. Абдурахмон берет кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений.Он выражает свою благодарность ООО МДО Арванд за финансовую поддержку , так как наша поддержка- ваш успех!
texts.en:
Abdurahmon was born and lives in a rural area. He was born in 1949. He is married and has three children. 

Abdurahmon since his youth has been involved in tending apricot orchards, and works as a foreman at a collective farm. In the summer season, Abdurahmon harvests the fruit, then dries it and sells at the local market. This is the main source of income for his family. His wife does not work anywhere, but she helps him in collecting, drying and selling the crop. 

Abdurahmon is taking a loan to buy mineral fertilizers. He expresses his gratitude to MDO Arvand for financial support.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: María Luisa vive junto a su hija, su nieto, y su madre en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y también comercia de forma ambulante, es muy conocida por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todos saben que  lo que vende es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al alcance de los clientes; María es una mujer comprometida, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde ya que todas sus compras son al contado por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Maria Luisa tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable se siente agradecida con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
María Luisa lives together with her daughter, her nephew, and her mother in her own home. She sells clothing for women, gentlemen and children - shirts, pants, dresses, and skirts, among other items. She has been in business for several years and this has given her much experience which allows her to obtain the best profits. 

The business is located in her home and she also sells as an itinerant saleswoman. She is very well-known by the people of the locale. She has acquired herself much clientele since everyone knows that what she sells is of quality, at accessible prices and with an unequaled service always to the order and available to the customers. 

María is a committed woman, dedicated to her work and very much a go-getter. She strives day to day to the maximum in order to make herself a better life and a great success for the future. 

In the last weeks the demand increased and she wants to make the most of it with a new investment, but she does not have enough capital that supports her since all her purchases are for cash. Because of this she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which allows her to buy clothing wholesale. 

María Luisa has good payment references and an irreproachable moral. She feels grateful for the support, sure that she will be able to settle the debt and at the same time has the hope that she will bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Martha Karla

texts.es:
La señora Martha Karla esta soltera, tiene 20 años de edad, cursó los grado de educación diversificada, se dedica al bordado de blusas, inicio este negocio con poco capital e insumos, hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que será utilizado, para la compra de telas y conos para mejorar su producción de blusas, espera seguir trabajando fuerte y tener un negocio con mucha demanda y poder vender su producción en otras regiones.
texts.en:
Martha Karla is single and 20 years old. She has completed her diploma in diversified education. Martha Karla embroiders blouses. She began this business with little capital and materials. Presently, she has 3 years experience.

Martha Karla is requesting a loan that will be utilized to buy cloth and cones of thread in order to improve her production of blouses. She hopes to continue working hard so that she can have a business with strong demand, and be able to sell her production in other regions.

loans.use: buy necessary materials for embroidering blouses.

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es:
Don  francisco,de 65 años de edad, originario de la comarca llamada el Boquerón, en las afueras de Teustepe, casado, padre de 6 hijos  mayores de edad, de oficio agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de chile, desde hace 10 años, el  cual realiza su siembra en un   pedazo de tierra  que le regalaron, el cual ha ido aumentando sus tierras  con mucho esfuerzo y arduo trabajo para  ampliar su área de siembra. Cuando él no está  cultivando sus chiles, se dedica a sembrar maíz para incrementar sus ganancias y obtener mejores ingresos económicos, ya que su cosecha chiles la vende en Managua en donde le pagan a un buen precio.
Él está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar  abono, combustibles para la planta de riego, fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra en su siembra de chile, con el objetivo de acudir su siembra para que la producción de chile cada vez aumente más,  sus metas próximas es poder cancelar el crédito para luego volver a solicitar otro
texts.en:
Sixty-five year old Francisco hails from the rural community of Boquerón, on the outskirts of Teustepe.  He is married and has 6 grown children.  He is a farmer and has made his living planting chillies for 10 years.  He plants his crop on a piece of land that was given to him, and has increased his landholdings little by little with great effort and hard work, in order to expand his planting area.

When he is not growing chillies, he makes his living planting corn in order to increase his earnings and get a better income.  He sells his chili harvest in Managua, where they give him a good price.

He is in need of financing to buy manure, fuel for his irrigation generator, and fertilizers, and to pay for labor for sowing his chili crop, with the aim of increasing his chili production with each crop.  His next goal is to be able to repay the loan in order to apply for another one.

loans.use: to buy manure, fuel for the irrigation generator, and fertilizers, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Ruben De Los Angeles

texts.es: Rubén de los Ángeles un hombre de 46 años de edad, soltero y padre de cinco hijos de 26, 25, 20, 10 y 9 años de edad, los dos menores son estudiantes de la escuela primaria. Este micro empresario es contratista y junto a su equipo de trabajo se dedica a realizar trabajos de albañilería y soldadura, trabajo que realiza desde muy joven. Solicita el crédito para realizar mejoras dentro de su vivienda, estas incluyen levantamiento de paredes y construcción de techo, desde que logro adquirir la vivienda tenía planes de realizar este proyecto pero se había visto imposibilitado por la falta ingresos. Rubén cuenta con el completo apoyo de sus hijos mayores quienes ya son independientes. Para realizar las reformas comprará bloques, cemento, zinc, entre otros materiales de construcción. Su mayor sueño es terminar de remodelar su vivienda.Rubén está muy agradecido con los inversionistas Kiva que le han brindando apoyo para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Rubén de los Ángeles is 46 years old, single, and the father to five children who are 9, 10, 20, 25, and 26 years old.  The two youngest are students at primary school.  This small businessman is a contractor.  Together with his team, he does masonry and welding jobs.  He has done this work since he was young.  

He is asking for this loan to make improvements inside his home, including putting up walls and constructing ceilings.  Since he got the house, he had plans to do this project, but it seemed impossible because of a lack of funds.  Rubén has the support of his older children who are already independent.  

To make the repairs, he will purchase blocks, cement, zinc, and other construction materials.  His dream is to finish remodeling his home.  Rubén is very grateful to Kiva investors who are providing support in order to have a decent working environment.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as blocks, cement, and zinc to improve his home.

loans.name: Bidii Group

texts.en:
Bidii is a group of 20 farmers in Bungoma District represented by Joseph. The group has three women and seven men.  Joseph is on the right of the photo with his hand raised. Farming inputs will be delivered to him on credit consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ acre of maize, millet and sorghum. The 2013 Long Rains season will be Joseph's first season with One Acre Fund.  He joined this year in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer and plans to use increased profits to send his children to school and to buy his son a plot of land.

Joseph managed to harvest two bags of maize on 1 1/2 acre of land last year. As a One Acre Fund farmer, he hopes to harvest even more. During the 2013 Long Rains season, each group member will receive ½ an acre of agricultural inputs on credit. Joseph’s group will receive 5 acres worth of inputs on credit.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Muattar

texts.ru: Муаттар работает в кондитерском цехе. Она не только изготавливает сладости, но и  контролирует производство и качество изготовленных булочек, печений, заварных и тортов. Муаттар очень трудолюбивая и к тому же умелая хозяйка, мастерица на все руки. Её ежемесячный доход направлен на обучение двоих детей и ежедневные расходы, а муж своим доходом обеспечивает питание и обувание своей семьи.  Несмотря на   не очень большой доход она старается создать хорошие условия для развития и обучения своих детей. С этими целями несколько лет тому назад она обратилась за кредитом в МДО «Арванд» и  вот уже который раз она приобретает кредит и обустраивает своё жильё. Также и теперь она хочет  получить очередной кредит для приобретения бытовой техники для дома. Муаттар старается  делать всё, чтобы её дети не нуждались не в чем и  выросли грамотными людьми. Как говорит сама Муаттар, «благодаря  поддержке от Арванд я смогу как то создать хорошие условия для своих детей и построить им хорошее будущее». Она искренне благодарит МДО «Арванд» и  за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Muattar works in a sweets shop. She not only makes sweets, but also controls the production and quality of prepared scones, pastries, custards, and cakes. Muattar is a very hardworking and also skillful hostess, a mistress of all trades. Her monthly income is directed at educating her two children and daily expenses, and her husband's income covers food and clothing for the family. Despite not being a very large income, she tries to create a good environment for the development and education of her children. 

With these goals, she applied for a loan a few years ago from MDO Arvand and now once again is getting a loan to equip her household. She now wants to get another loan for the purchase of household appliances. 

Muattar tries to do everything such that her children will not need for anything and will grow into literate people. As Muattar herself says, «Thanks to the support from Arvand, I can create a good environment for my children and build them a good future." She sincerely thanks MDO Arvand also for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase household appliances

loans.name: Recho

texts.en:
Rachael is 39 years old and living happily with her five children. From the growth of her cereals business, Rachael bought a second-hand motorbike which she uses for her transportation business, which has been operating for one year. She is getting a monthly income of KES 8,000.

With this second loan of KES 50,000 from KADET LTD, she intends to purchase eight bags of dry maize for her cereals business and purchase spare parts to repair her motorbike.  

The profits she earns will be used to repay the loan and plough back into her businesses. She hopes to own a grinding machine and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase eight bags of dry maize and spare parts for her motorbike repair

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer, 27 years old, is married and blessed with three children. They are currently residing at the village of Napaccu Grande. She owns and operates a food production business, specifically selling frozen foods such as hot dogs, hams, and cured pork, in this business, she earns a net income amounting to PHP 8,000 a month. She would like a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase frozen food products to sell. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can improve her business.

loans.use: To purchase frozen food products to sell

loans.name: Faulu B Group

texts.en:
Wilson’s group has 10 farmers and is located in Bungoma South District. Wilson is pictured on the right of Faulu B Group with his hand raised. Wilson is pictured among the three men and seven women of his group.  He will receive input loans capable of planting ½ an acre with sorghum, millet, and maize. Wilson is a new One Acre Fund farmer and is excited for the 2013 Long Rains season. He joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer and learn new methods of planting maize.

Wilson described his harvest last year as good, but hopes he can have an even better one as a One Acre Fund farmer. He plans on using future profits from the harvest to send his children to school, invest in livestock, and make bricks. During the 2013 Long Rains season, each group member will receive ½ an acre of agricultural inputs on credit. Wilson’s group will receive 5 acres worth of inputs on credit.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married with two children. She is 36 years old and lives in Pines, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

Virginia is engaged in a general store business to earn a living and has had this business for four years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work.  

She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, vinegar, and sugar.

Virginia has been a member of PMPC for five years.  She hopes to have more savings in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, vinegar, and sugar.

loans.name: Prak's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a village of the Sa Ang district of Kandal province, Cambodia, Prak is a 48-year-old mother of seven children, four of whom are dependent on her and are still in school. To support her family, she has been farming rice for thirty years. She is able to earn about KHR 12,000 per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Prak has been with VisionFund Cambodia for two cycles and completely paid back the past loans. The past loan has helped her to better support her family’s living conditions. 

Now, she is leading her group of three (Prak's Group) to ask for a loan. Prak will use her portion to buy materials for building a decent latrine, such as a latrine bowl, tile draining, sewage, etc. She hopes this loan will enable her family to have a healthy latrine and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy materials for building a decent latrine.

loans.name: Ana Raquel

texts.es:
Ana de 36 años de edad,  originaria de la Comarca llamadas las Canoas, en las afueras de Teustepe, casada, madre de 3  hijos entre las edades de 3, 6 y 13 años, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al  negocio de molino  y alquiler de sillas,  mesas plásticas. Inicio en el ámbito del comercio desde muy joven trabajando en una empresa, la cual fue ahorrando dinero poco a poco y fue allí que decidió emprender su propio negocio de servicios de molino, la cual también se dedica a alquiler de sillas y mesas, con  préstamos  financieros que le dio una institución, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su hija y su marido quien le administra el negocio del molino. También recibe otros ingresos de familiares que están en el extranjero. 
 En esta ocasión  Ana esta  requiriendo  el financiamiento para  comprar  sillas, mesas. ya que estima que este  crédito le  ayudaría a  comprar todo lo necesario para su negocio y brindar un mejor servicio a su clientela, con el objetivo de incrementar sus ganancias,  para pagar el crédito y luego volver a solicitar otro, una de sus metas es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Ana is 36 years old and originally from the Canoas region in the outskirts of Teustepe.  She is married and has three children who are 3, 6, and 13 years old.  She works as a retailer.  She has a mill and she also rents plastic tables and chairs.  She started working very young at a business and saved money little by little.  From there, she decided to start her own business providing mill services.  She also rents tables and chairs.  

She has received loans from the institution and also counts on the support of her husband and her daughter, who runs the mill business.  She also receives income from relatives who live abroad.  

Ana is requesting this loan to purchase tables and chairs.  She says that this loan will help her to purchase everything she needs for her business and allow her to provide better service to her customers.  She hopes to increase her income to repay the loan and later return to request another.  One of her goals is to improve the infrastructure of her house.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus tíos, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Tahuantinsuyo  de la ciudad de El Alto.

El estudió hasta el nivel de Técnico Superior en Mecánica y Electricidad en la Escuela Industrial Pedro Domingo Murillo de la ciudad de La Paz, ahora tiene su propio taller en la zona de Villa Tunari en la ciudad de El Alto.

El crédito lo requiere para comprar material (pinzas, llaves inglesas, cables) para arreglar motores y hacer cableado de vehículos en su taller.

El sueño de Juan Carlos es tener un taller que realicé todo tipo de trabajo automotriz.

Es la Segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Juan Carlos is single and has no children; he lives with his aunt and uncle in their house located in the city of El Alto’s Tahuantinsuyo zone.  He completed upper technical level of education in auto mechanics and electricity at the Pedro Domingo Murillo Industrial School in the city of La Paz.  He now has his own auto repair shop in the city of El Alto’s Villa Tunari zone.  He needs the loan to buy supplies (pliers, wrenches, cables) to repair engines and wiring in cars in his shop.  His dream is to have a shop able to do all types of car repairs.  This is his second IMPRO loan request and first with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy tools and cables to repair engines and electrical wiring in cars.

loans.name: Thy's Group

texts.en:
Thy, 43, lives in a rural village of Kandal province’s Sa Ang district, Cambodia. She is married and has two children. For the last 25 years, Thy has been farming rice while her husband supplements the income by working as a motor taxi driver in the local area. The current business earns her about 10,000 KHR per day and she manages to save about 1,000 KHR after daily expenses. Now she is leading her group of two to ask for a loan. 
Thy is in her first microloan with VisionFund while the other member has been with VisionFund for two loans. As the leader, Thy is going to use her portion to buy materials for building a proper latrine for her family to use.

loans.use: To buy materials for building a proper latrine

loans.name: Elias

texts.en:
Elias is 36 years old and a businessman and a farmer. He is married to Jane and blessed with two children. 

Elias has been operating a public service vehicle as his primary business and farming as his secondary business for the past six years. He earns a monthly income of KES 90,000, which he uses to provide for his family.

He is applying for his first loan term with KADET LTD, after being introduced to KADET LTD by KADET staff.  Elias will use the loan to buy farm inputs like manure, pesticides, fertilizer, etc.

With the anticipated profit from the businesses, he will expand his business and improve the living standards of his family. His hopes and dreams are to purchase his own public service vehicle with the help of KADET.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like manure, pesticides, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Sokthou's Group

texts.en:
Sokthou is from a rural village in the Sa Ang district of Kandal province, Cambodia. He is a 25-year-old married father of two children, both of whom are dependents and still in school. 

Sokthou has struggled to feed his children by farming rice, raising chickens and working for others for a fee, while his wife sells grocery items. The current business earns his family about 10,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Sokthou is just with VisionFund this cycle. He is now leading his group of three to ask for a loan. As the leader, Sokthou is going to use his portion to buy materials to construct a decent latrine. He'll need cement, bricks, a latrine pan, etc. 

He hopes that this loan will enable his family to have a clean latrine for daily use so as to improve and have a healthy standard of living.

loans.use: to buy materials to construct a decent latrine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mechanized farming equipment

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma es Casada y tiene una hija, vive en casa propia donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio, la cocina y el baño, la  habitación es de adobe y el piso de cemento, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani de la Ciudad de La Paz, donde se encuentran en la calle vive poca luz por las noches.

Actualmente trabaja de viajando y acomodando ropa de todo tipo que  comercializa por las diferentes zonas.  Su trabajo es independiente trabajando actualmente en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz, sostiene a su familia con el pago de los servicios, comida y educación de su hija, el esposo trabaja en el interior del país.

El crédito lo requiere para comprar más mercadería(ropa de todo tipo) ya que cuenta con muy poco capital de trabajo con el cual tiene poco movimiento en su mercadería, y así el crédito le ayudara a mejorar sus ingresos.

Es la quinta vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y  la tercera con KIVA.
texts.en:
Irma is married and has a daughter. She lives in her own home with one floor and a bedroom, kitchen and bathroom.  The building is made of adobe and the floor of cement. The house is located in Tembladerani in the city of La Paz, in a street without much street lighting at night.

Irma currently works traveling and collecting all kinds of clothing which she sells in different areas. She is self employed, and works in Tembladerani in the city of La Paz at the moment. She supports her family by paying for food, bills, and her daughter's education. Her husband works in the interior of the country.

She needs this loan to buy more merchandize (all kinds of clothing), because she has very little working capital which means that she does not sell much merchandize. The loan will help her to increase her earnings. 

This is the fifth time that she is requesting a loan from IMPRO and the third from KIVA.

loans.use: to buy all kinds of clothing for men and women to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru:
Дилафрузу 37 лет. Она добрая и целеустремленная женщина. Дилафруз с детства всегда мечтала быть успешной бизнес леди и всегда стремится осуществлять эту заветную мечту.
Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Детям 17, 16 и 8 лет. Ее муж занимается услугой мастера по ремонту дома и получает маленькую зарплату. Это зарплата не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Дилафруз   решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес скотоводством. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilafruz is 37 years old. She is a kind and determined woman. Since childhood, Dilafruz has always dreamed of being a successful business lady and always strives to implement this cherished dream. 

She is married and has three children, aged 8, 16 and 17. Her husband is engaged in home repair services and receives a small salary. This salary is not enough to provide the family with all the required means. Dilafruz decided to help her husband for the benefit of the family. 

With this goal, she took a course "Bring It On" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. Now, she can thoroughly start her own business and become successful in this sphere. She wants to start a livestock business. 

From the revenue earned, she plans to provide her children with a good education and high-calorie food. She is requesting a loan of $3,000 to buy cattle to start a new business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Thy's Group

texts.en:
Thy, 47 years old, lives in a rural area in the Sa Ang district, Kandal province. She is married and has two sons. Thy and her husband have made a living by farming rice and planting taro for 29 years. The current business earns her about 9,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day to support the family. 
 
Thy has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle, while the other group members are just starting with VisionFund this cycle. She is leading her group of three to ask for a loan. Thy, the leader, is going to use her portion to buy materials such as a latrine bowl, tile and sewage draining, etc., to build a proper latrine. She hopes this loan will enable her family to have a healthy latrine for an improved life.

loans.use: to buy materials such as a latrine bowl, tile and sewage draining, etc, to build a proper latrine.

loans.name: David

texts.es: David está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará en San Jacinto, municipio del Departamento de Bolivar, al cual viajará, ropa para damas, sombreros, mochilas alusivas al carnaval de Barranquilla, aprovechando que la temporada se acerca y dará a su clientela justamente lo que ellos necesitan, para que lo disfruten bailando al son de la cumbia y el mapalé. Con su anterior credito le fue muy bien porque compró juguetes, ropa y electrodomésticos logrando aprovechar el potencial de ofertas del fin de año y la ciuculación de dinero en cada uno de sus clientes, por eso está muy agradecido con sus finaciadores.
texts.en:
David is applying for a new credikiva so he can travel to San Jacinto in the Department of Bolivar Municipality to buy women's clothing, hats and Baranquilla carnival themed backpacks. 

He will take advantage of the approaching Carnival season and give his clientele exactly what they need so that they enjoy dancing the cumbia and the mapalé.

He did very well with his last loan. He bought toys, clothes and appliances which allowed him to take advantage of end of year sales and circulating money through to all of his customers. 

He is very thankful to his financiers.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing, hats and Baranquilla carnival themed backpacks.

loans.name: Garnik

texts.en:
Garnik is engaged in a fruits and vegetables wholesale trade. He buys the merchandise using his car in the Republic of Georgia and from villages of Ararat region.  

The main part of the goods he sells to retailers. The other part he sells in small shops in Vanadzor city. Garnik's mother from time to time helps him in trading. This activity he has performed for more than five years.

Garnik is 30 years old. He is married and lives in Vanadzor city with his wife, son and mother. Trading is the only source of family income, and with the profit from trading, Garnik solves his family needs, pays all bills for the flat, etc.
  
Garnik is seeking a 500,000 Armenian Drams loan to buy and resell citruses and tropical fruits from the Republic of Georgia.

loans.use: To buy and resell citruses and tropical fruits.

loans.name: Miatta

texts.en:
Miatta is 34 years old and lives in Kakata, the capital city of Margibi County, which has the highest production of rubber plantations in Liberia. She is single, with four children between 5 months and 15 years old. Only three live at home and are in school. 

Miatta stopped her education at ninth grade and, for ten years now, she has been selling lappa (fabric) around her community. She started her business by selling dough (bread), with small money from her mother, and she learned this trade from her mother. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more lappa (fabric) for her business. She hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more lappa (fabric) for her business.

loans.name: Yuriy

texts.ru:
Юрий живет в Каменке, в своем доме; он женат, есть один сын, который учится в школе. Вот уже 8 лет как
Юрий занимается выращиванием овощей на своем земельном участке. Он выращивают помидоры, редис и огурцы.

Недавно был сильный ветер, на одной из теплиц сильно погнуло дуги, теперь нужно их менять. Для этого Юрию нужны дополнительные средства. Также Юрий хочет улучшить систему отопления в теплице, чтобы получать более ранний урожай. У Юрия есть еще один земельный участок, где он хочет строить еще теплицы, но уже в следующем году.
texts.en:
Yuriy lives in Kamenka in his own house. He is married and has one son who goes to school. Yuriy has been cultivating vegetables on his own plot of land for eight years now. He grows tomatoes, radishes and cucumbers.

Just recently there was a strong win and on one of the greenhouses the arches got bent and need to be replaced. Yuriy needs additional money to do this. Also Yuriy wants to improve the heating system in the greenhouse so he can collect an earlier harvest. He has one more plot of land where he wants to build additional greenhouses, but in the next year.

loans.use: to repair the greenhouse and install a heating system.

loans.name: Yolanda De Jesus

texts.es: Yolanda de 34 años de edad habita junto  a su familia. Es una mujer muy emprendedora y siempre lo que más le ha importado es brindar lo mejor para vivir en condiciones estables por ella y su familia, es muy conocida por sus vecinos por ser trabajadora y en la actualidad tiene un pequeño puesto donde vende verduras y flores diferentes estilos a precios muy convenientes y accesibles para el público. Yolanda desea incrementar más sus ventas teniendo mejores productos es por eso que decidió acercarse a INTEGRAL y solicitar un crédito para poder comprar flores, diferentes colores y tipos y también comprar verduras como papas, güisquil, cilantro, rábano etc. Espera y confía en que pronto cumplirá su sueño de tener una vida con mejores condiciones para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 34, lives with her family. She is a very entrepreneurial woman and the most important thing to her has always been to work towards more stable living conditions for her and her family. 

She is well known by her neighbors for being hard working. Currently she has a small stall where she sells vegetables and different types of flowers at very reasonable prices that are accessible to the public. 

Yolanda wants to increase her sales by having better products. 

This is why she approached INTEGRAL and is requesting a loan in order to buy different types and colored flowers as well as vegetables such as potatoes, chayote, cilantro, radishes etc. 

She hopes and is believes that soon her dream of having a better life for her and her family will come true.

loans.use: to buy different types and colored flowers as well as vegetables such as potatoes, chayote, cilantro, radishes etc.

loans.name: Bulondo B Group

texts.en:
Francis is a member of Bulondo B Group in Bungoma South District. He is pictured with 12 One Acre Fund farmers: 11 women and 1 man. Francis is standing on the right with his hand raised. He is receiving an input loan for ½ an acre of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. Francis first enrolled with One Acre Fund during the 2011 Long Rains and is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. Francis joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough food for his family and use increased profits to send his children to school.

Francis reports that before One Acre Fund, he was able to grow about four bags of maize per acre, but with his One Acre Fund input loan during Long Rains 2012, he harvested seven bags per 1/2 acre. He plans to use the money that he earns from his next harvest to send his children to school and save for the future. For the 2013 Long Rains season, Francis’s group members will take input loans of ½ an acre each. In total, this group will receive input loans for use on six acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Yuriy

texts.ru:
Юрий занимается выращивание овощей в теприцах. Он использовал предыдущий КИВА кредит для закупки пленки и семян. В результате удачного сезона Юрий смог улучшить свои жилищные условия - сделать ремонт в ванной комнате и установить туалет в доме (до этого туалет был только на улице). Также он купил котел для отопления теплиц.

В этот раз Юрию нужны дополнительные средства, чтобы построить еще одну теплицу для рассады и подключить систему отопления. Благодаря этому Юрий сможет раньше посадить семена и раньше собрать урожай, который можно продать по более высокой цене.
texts.en: Yuriy earns a living by growing vegetables in greenhouses. He used his previous Kiva loan to purchase plastic covering and seeds. As a result of his successful season, he was able to improve his living conditions by renovating his bathroom and installing a toilet in his house (prior to that, the toilet was outside.) He also bought a boiler to heat the greenhouses. This time, Yuriy needs supplementary financial resources to build one more greenhouse for seedlings and to connect the heating system. This will allow him to plant seeds and harvest the produce earlier, which will enable him to sell the vegetables at a more profitable price.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse for seedlings and to connect the heating system

loans.name: Victorious E Group

texts.en:
Victorious E is a group of 10 farmers in Bungoma South District, represented by Benard. The group has 7 women and 3 men. Benard is on the right of the photo, with his hand raised. Farming inputs will be delivered to him on credit, consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ an acre of maize, millet and sorghum.

Benard joined One Acre Fund during the Long Rains 2011, and is now enrolling in the Long Rains 2013 season. Benard joined One Acre Fund so that he could grow enough food for the family and use the increased profits to send his children to school. Prior to joining One Acre Fund, Benard was able to harvest only 1.5 bags of maize per half-acre. After joining One Acre Fund, during the Long Rains 2012 he was able to harvest 6 bags per half-acre. He hopes that his profits from the 2013 Long Rains season can be used to send his children to school and to save for the future.

Benard’s group members will each receive input loans for ½ acre, for the 2013 Long Rains season. In total, they will receive inputs for five acres of maize, millet and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Victorious H Group

texts.en:
Victorious H Group is located in Bungoma South District. It is a group of eight women and three men led by Thomas, pictured on the right with his hand raised. 

Thomas is receiving an input loan for 0.5 acres of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. Thomas joined One Acre Fund during the Long Rains 2009, and is now enrolling in the Long Rains 2013 season. Thomas joined One Acre Fund, so that he could gain access the best input prices and grow enough food for the family.

Thomas described his last year's harvest as good, but believes he can have an even better one this year. He plans on using future profits from the harvest to send his children to school and to repair his home. 

Victorious H Group members will each receive input loans of 0.5 acres during the 2013 Long Rains season. In total, they will receive inputs for 5.5 acres of maize and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is 41 years old, married, and has four children.  She is from Ubay, Bohol. She is engaged in rice farming business, which she has been doing for more than 10 years. 

Rosenda is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy  feritlizer and pesticides for the farm.  With this loan, she will be able to improve their farm and eventually their harvest. In the future, Rosenda hopes to make their farming business a success.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Sandra Margarita

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer de 36 años, es soltera y no tiene hijos, por cuestión de bajos recursos económicos en su hogar, alcanzó a terminar la escuela primaria sin oportunidad de llegar a ser bachiller y mucho menos profesional, viéndose frustrados muchos de sus sueños. Vive en el cantón Santo Domingo de la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas. Santo Domingo se encuentra conectando la Región Sierra con la Región Costa del Ecuador, es una ciudad que se ha convertido en un eje comercial con varios sectores en crecimiento y como prueba se tiene a varias familias emprendedoras que hace algunos años comenzaron con pequeños negocios. Los estudios revelan que todos los negocios en su mayoría, empezaron empíricamente y han tenido acogida por el paso de turistas, empresarios y viajeros que se trasladan de una región a otra. Sandra reside en la Parroquia Puerto Limón de este cantón, un sector que fue habitado por una comunidad tsáchila hace muchos años y tiene varios atractivos turísticos. Además los habitantes de esta parroquia en su gran mayoría, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.
Sandra siendo muy pequeña ayudaba a sus padres a criar pollos y gallinas para la posterior venta, terminando la escuela se dedicaba a ayudar a su madre en los quehaceres del hogar y también a cuidar a los animales. Con este aprendizaje, Sandra hace 2 años empezó el negocio por sí sola y también atiende un local de venta de balanceado en un pequeño espacio de su casa. Dedica a este negocio 8 horas cada día. Sandra siempre ha tenido objetivos y metas altos, es por eso que ella ahora necesita ampliar su negocio de venta de balanceado y crianza de pollos, acudiendo de alguna forma a la herramienta de publicidad y así incrementar sus ingresos y tener realización personal. Es por esto que solicita un crédito para comprar los insumos que sean necesarios. Fundación Alternativa le brindó la atención oportuna y ágil que ella necesitaba y que no había obtenido anteriormente. Sandra agradece su participación en la obtención de sus sueños en cualquier parte del mundo en donde usted se encuentre.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 36 year old woman. She is single and has no children. Due to poor economic resources at home she was only able to finish elementary school without the opportunity to graduate from high school and even less to get a professional degree leaving her frustrated because she has not accomplished many of her dreams. 

She lives in the district of Santo Domingo in the Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas province. 
Santo Domingo connects the Ecuadorian mountain region with the coastal region. It is a city which has turned into the commerical axis with several growing sectors. As proof it has several entrepreneurial families that a few years ago started with small businesses. Studies show that a majoriity of the businesses started empirically and have grown due to tourists, business people and travelers moving from one region to the other. 

Sandra lives in the Puerto Limón parish in this district. This sector was inhabited by a Tsáchila community many years ago and has several tourist attractions. Also, a majority of the inhabitants of this parish work in agriculture and livestock.  

Since she was very little Sandra helped her parents to raise chickens and hens for sale. After school she would help her mother with chores around the house as well as taking care of the animals. 

With this training Sandra started her own business two years ago. She also takes care of a small feed selling business out of her home. She spends eight hours a day on this business. 

Sandra has always had high expectations and goals. This is why she now wants to expand her feed and chicken raising business. She wants to use some form of advertisement and in this way increase her income and gain personal fulfillment. 

She is requesting this loan to buy the necessary supplies.


Fundación Alternativa gave her the attention that she needed and has not been able to get before. 

Sandra is thankful for everyone around the world who is helping her dreams come true.
